supplier_of: goods handling systems, continuous | feeders | screw-type conveyors | screw sectors | screening machines, screening plants and screening equipment
information: Established by Georg Steiner, Steiner Spiralförderanlagen has been active for more than 35 years. Long-standing experience is essential when planning complex conveyor systems. We offer our customers maximum security: Not only does Steiner Spiralförderanlagen accompany you through systems planning, but we are also available to answer questions, make alterations as requested and solve problems in the time thereafter. We offer a wide range of products: From conveyor systems for foodstuffs to systems for powders, granulates, recycled materials, biomass and wood pellets; and from our classic standard solutions to customised products – we plan, construct and manufacture according to individual customer requirements. Are you looking for the optimal solution? Contact us for a free consultation!
